value.title: Fleksy rolls out an SDK for its AI keyboard

value.title: The weird, frightening future of AI may not be what you think

value.title: IIHS Is Wrong In Claim That Only One Third Of Crashes Can Be Prevented By Self-Driving
value.excerpt: They claim only 1/3rd of crashes will be prevented by robocars. But they think the hard crashes are easy and the easy crashes are hard, getting it really wrong. How will robots make dangerous mistakes?
